document.full_text: moving to the beat of 1990s pop hit "american boy," russian president dmitry medvedev's stiff dance moves became an immediate viral hit on youtube on wednesday.
document.title: russia's medvedev shows off "dated" dance moves
lines_and_colors: moving to the beat of 1990s pop hit "american boy," russian president dmitry medvedev's stiff dance moves became an immediate viral hit on youtube on wednesday.
